DOC.brief_summary: This study measure impact cost-effectiveness low-cost , non-monetary incentive ( `` mama kit '' ) rural facility delivery rate Zambia .
DOC.brief_title: The Impact Non-monetary Incentives Facility Delivery Rural Zambia
DOC.detailed_description: This cluster randomize control trial assess impact provide package childcare item ( cloth , baby diaper , blanket ) woman conditional upon deliver facility facility delivery rate rural Serenje Chadiza Districts Zambia . Facilities randomize either provide intervention . Facility-level antenatal care ( ANC ) delivery register use measure percentage woman attend antenatal care deliver study facility intervention period . Results trial use model cost-effectiveness mama kit at-scale term cost per death avert .
DOC.criteria: Had antenatal care record one study facility Had estimate date delivery ( measure estimate date last menstrual period , estimate date delivery , estimate gestational age week record antenatal care register ) June 1 , 2013 Aug 31 , 2013 . Did antenatal care record one study facility Had estimate date delivery outside intervention window ( June 1 , 2013 Aug 31 , 2013 )
